title: How to Keep From Being Afraid After Playing a Roblox Horror Game

steps.headline: Turn the volume down, even if it says to turn the volume up.
Cover your eyes if it looks like a pop up will come.
Play games like "Bloody Mary" or "Hospital Nightmare 3" which have little-to-no pop ups.
steps.description: Do not play games like " Haunted Chronicles 2" or "dusty678's Face Your Fears". They will give you nightmares.

text: Turn the volume down, even if it says to turn the volume up.  Cover your eyes if it looks like a pop up will come.  Play games like "Bloody Mary" or "Hospital Nightmare 3" which have little-to-no pop ups. Do not play games like " Haunted Chronicles 2" or "dusty678's Face Your Fears". They will give you nightmares. Have a nightmare-free night!
